mapper.sql: Id, name, alias, sex, case when sex = 1 then '男' when sex = 2 then '女' else '' end as sex_name, nationality, nation, address, belief, birthplace, native_place, open_type, case when open_type = 0 then '公开' when open_type = 1 then '不公开' else '' end as open_type_name, status, case when status = 0 then '正常' when status = 1 then '到期' else '' end as status_name, create_date, validity, create_user, (select real_name from ujn_member m where m.id = create_user) as create_user_name
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ujn_hall (name, alias, sex, nationality, nation, address, belief, birthplace, native_place, open_type, status, create_date, validity, create_user, achievement ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{native_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{open_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{achievement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update ujn_hall
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
belief = #{belief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthplace = #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
native_place = #{native_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_type = #{open_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
validity = #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
achievement = #{achievement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ujn_hall set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, belief = #{belief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthplace = #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, native_place = #{native_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_type = #{open_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validity = #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, achievement = #{achievement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
,
from ujn_hall order by id desc

select
,
from ujn_hall where create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc

select
,
from ujn_hall where open_type = '2' and unix_timestamp(validity) < unix_timestamp(now()) order by id desc
